remarks: Decompose a group sum into projections.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
statement:
dpjfval.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjfval.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjfval.p $e |- P = ( G dProj S ) $.
dpjidcl.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( G DProd S ) ) $.
dpjidcl.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dpjidcl.w $e |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp .0. } $.
dpjeq.c $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> C ) e. W ) $.
dpjeq $p |- ( ph -> ( A = ( G gsum ( x e. I |-> C ) ) <-> A. x e. I ( ( P ` x ) ` A ) = C ) ) $.
$d .0. h x $.
$d A h x $.
$d C h $.
$d G h i x $.
$d I h i x $.
$d P h x $.
$d S h i x $.
$d W x $.
$d h x $.
$d i ph x $.
